posts.title: Stay Healthy When Exercising Outdoors
posts.abstract: Cold weather workouts do bring unique risks, but a little planning and preparation can help whether you’re going for a winter walk, trekking in snowshoes or sledding with the kids.

posts.title: 4 Skiers Killed in Avalanche in Utah, Officials Say
posts.abstract: It was the third such deadly episode in days and the deadliest avalanche in the United States since May 2014, according to the authorities.
posts.caption: A helicopter returning to Millcreek Canyon after rescuing one of the four avalanche survivors on Saturday.
